name: Marc Anthony Big Volume Hair Mousse for Fine, Thin Hair - Lightweight Volumizing Hair Styler with Flexible Hold for Full Body & Bounce - Frizz-Free & Sulfate-Free Hair Care Product
short_description: Big on Volume, Light on Feel: Say goodbye to flat, lifeless strands. Marc Anthony’s Big Volume Weightless Lift Mousse transforms fine, limp hair into full, voluminous styles with weightless body and bounce – all while keeping it soft and touchable. 8.4 oz

Powered By Fiber Filler Complex: Formulated with our micro-light Fiber Filler Complex like those used in volumizing mascara, this lightweight mousse delivers maximum volume while maintaining your hair’s natural movement and softness.

Bombshell Volume That Lasts: Create bombshell-worthy, all-over volume that lasts up to 72 hours*. Experience long-lasting fullness, body, and hold, all with a smooth, natural-looking finish you can run your fingers through.

Lightweight Hydration + Heat Protection: Unlike traditional mousses that dry out strands, this foam formula infuses lightweight moisture while maintaining weightless lift. Plus, it offers heat protection up to 450°F to defend hair during styling. The mousse offers humidity and frizz protection.

Endless Innovation: With paraben-free, sulfate-free, and phthalate-free formulas, the Big Volume collection is perfect for men and women with thin or fine hair, from straight to curly to colored and everything in between.

Perfected to Play: Marc Anthony believes hair care does not need to be boring, nor does it need to be complicated. Hair can be a source of enjoyment and entertainment. All the styles. All the fun. We do what it takes to make hair play possible.

name: Nexxus Hy-Volume Weightless Lift Cloud Foam Treatment for Flat & Limp Hair, 48 Hours Volume, ProteinFusion with Collagen & Hyaluronic Acid, 5.5 fl oz
short_description: HY-VOLUME CLOUD FOAM FOR FLAT, LIMP HAIR: Our 1st aerated serum foam gives you 3X weightless healthy volume in 1 use.
WEIGHTLESS, HEALTHY VOLUME: Our cloud foam provides heat and humidity protection, is alcohol free and leaves hair soft, shiny & bouncy. No stiffness or crunch.
SEE THE SCIENCE: Powered by our 1st tubing technology with hyaluronic acid to instantly strengthen, plump & lift every hair strand from root to tip.
PROTEIN POWERED FORMULA: Our exclusive ProteinFusion blend with collagen protein and hyaluronic acid gives you 48hrs of gravity defying volume.
REFRESHING, INVIGORATING FRAGRANCE: Citrus breeze fragrance with uplifting white citrus notes balanced with delicate floral tones for long-lasting freshness.
HOW TO USE: Section damp hair and apply 2-3 pumps at the roots, working through to ends. Blow dry with a round brush for maximum lift.
product_description: It's time for a volume revolution with New Nexxus HY-VOLUME Weightless Lift Collection, get 3x weightless, healthy volume in 1 use. The collection has a revitalizing aroma of citrus breeze fragrance with uplifting white citrus notes balanced with delicate floral tones for long-lasting freshness. Our Cloud Foam is the first tubing technology with hyaluronic acid, to instantly strengthen, plump and lift every hair strand from root to tip for 48h of gravity defying volume. Our formula contains exclusive protein fusion blend with collagen protein and hyaluronic acid. Our first ever foam not only enhances your hair's appearance but also defends against humidity, heat, and sweat. The alcohol free product is a combination of plumping serum + sculpting mousse infused with air microbubbles for a weightless finish. This airy, heat-protecting foam offers 3x the volume and lift compared to untreated hair, without any stiffness or crunch. Your hair will feel weightlessly soft, shiny, and have a healthy bounce that is life and sleep proof, even on day 2. For best results, start with Nexxus HY-VOLUME Shampoo and Conditioner. Follow with HY-VOLUME Cloud Foam. To use, section damp hair and apply 2-3 pumps at the roots, working through to ends. Blow dry with a round brush for maximum lift. Born in salons and perfected by science, our Nexxus collections were crafted by our team of expert scientists and stylists. We care about your hair health from shower to style. All of the shampoos and conditioners have our exclusive h4 complex to restore and protect the 4 signs of hair health: strength, moisture, elasticity, and shine. Our styling collection has exclusive StyleProtect Technology to protect hair from damage as you style. By choosing Nexxus, you know you are doing something for your hair, not to your hair, ensuring you look your best.
